author: AWADHESH GUPTA
text: Kanpur is one of the biggest city of Utter Pradesh , a biggest state of India having about 25 million urban population in the state. Kanpur is one of the biggest city having 2.8 million population as per 2001 census. it is one of the oldest city of state and due to this old roads has no scope of road widening and even some of the crossing does not have sufficient turning radius for public transport vehicles.
title: Traffic and Transportation Problems of Kanpur (U.P) India
